DOC.brief_summary: The study will compare the effect of pramipexole on different types of tremor and particularly kinetic tremor in early and advanced Parkinson's disease patients and will evaluate the course of tremor measured with spiralometry under pramipexole treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Kinetic Tremor in Parkinsons Disease: Its Course Under Pramipexole (Mirapexin®) Treatment and Impact on Quality of Life
DOC.criteria: 1. Idiopathic Parkinson's disease with or without fluctuations 2. Indication for treatment with pramipexole (Mirapexin®) 3. Presence of at least mild tremor symptoms (as judged by the treating physician) 1. Any contraindications according to the Summary of Product Characteristics (SPC): hypersensitivity to pramipexole or to any of the excipients. 2. Ongoing treatment with pramipexole (Mirapexin®)
